00006  *     CRC16 & CheckSum16 calculation functions
00007  *     CreateCRC was written (aparently) by Bjorn Stenberg

00011 
00012 #include "cdata.h"
00013 #include "crc_csum.h"
00014 
00015 
00016 
00017 USHORT Calc_CheckSum(UCHAR *mem, ULONG size){
00018     USHORT u=0;
00019 
00020     while(size--) u += *mem++;
00021     return (USHORT)(u & 0xffff);
00022 }
00023 
00024 
00025 
00026 USHORT CreateCRC(UCHAR* mem, ULONG size ){
00027     static USHORT CRCTab[256]={
00028         0x0000,0xC0C1,0xC181,0x0140,0xC301,0x03C0,0x0280,0xC241,
00029         0xC601,0x06C0,0x0780,0xC741,0x0500,0xC5C1,0xC481,0x0440,
00030         0xCC01,0x0CC0,0x0D80,0xCD41,0x0F00,0xCFC1,0xCE81,0x0E40,
00031         0x0A00,0xCAC1,0xCB81,0x0B40,0xC901,0x09C0,0x0880,0xC841,
00032         0xD801,0x18C0,0x1980,0xD941,0x1B00,0xDBC1,0xDA81,0x1A40,
00033         0x1E00,0xDEC1,0xDF81,0x1F40,0xDD01,0x1DC0,0x1C80,0xDC41,
00034         0x1400,0xD4C1,0xD581,0x1540,0xD701,0x17C0,0x1680,0xD641,
00035         0xD201,0x12C0,0x1380,0xD341,0x1100,0xD1C1,0xD081,0x1040,
00036         0xF001,0x30C0,0x3180,0xF141,0x3300,0xF3C1,0xF281,0x3240,
00037         0x3600,0xF6C1,0xF781,0x3740,0xF501,0x35C0,0x3480,0xF441,
00038         0x3C00,0xFCC1,0xFD81,0x3D40,0xFF01,0x3FC0,0x3E80,0xFE41,
00039         0xFA01,0x3AC0,0x3B80,0xFB41,0x3900,0xF9C1,0xF881,0x3840,
00040         0x2800,0xE8C1,0xE981,0x2940,0xEB01,0x2BC0,0x2A80,0xEA41,
00041         0xEE01,0x2EC0,0x2F80,0xEF41,0x2D00,0xEDC1,0xEC81,0x2C40,
00042         0xE401,0x24C0,0x2580,0xE541,0x2700,0xE7C1,0xE681,0x2640,
00043         0x2200,0xE2C1,0xE381,0x2340,0xE101,0x21C0,0x2080,0xE041,
00044         0xA001,0x60C0,0x6180,0xA141,0x6300,0xA3C1,0xA281,0x6240,
00045         0x6600,0xA6C1,0xA781,0x6740,0xA501,0x65C0,0x6480,0xA441,
00046         0x6C00,0xACC1,0xAD81,0x6D40,0xAF01,0x6FC0,0x6E80,0xAE41,
00047         0xAA01,0x6AC0,0x6B80,0xAB41,0x6900,0xA9C1,0xA881,0x6840,
00048         0x7800,0xB8C1,0xB981,0x7940,0xBB01,0x7BC0,0x7A80,0xBA41,
00049         0xBE01,0x7EC0,0x7F80,0xBF41,0x7D00,0xBDC1,0xBC81,0x7C40,
00050         0xB401,0x74C0,0x7580,0xB541,0x7700,0xB7C1,0xB681,0x7640,
00051         0x7200,0xB2C1,0xB381,0x7340,0xB101,0x71C0,0x7080,0xB041,
00052         0x5000,0x90C1,0x9181,0x5140,0x9301,0x53C0,0x5280,0x9241,
00053         0x9601,0x56C0,0x5780,0x9741,0x5500,0x95C1,0x9481,0x5440,
00054         0x9C01,0x5CC0,0x5D80,0x9D41,0x5F00,0x9FC1,0x9E81,0x5E40,
00055         0x5A00,0x9AC1,0x9B81,0x5B40,0x9901,0x59C0,0x5880,0x9841,
00056         0x8801,0x48C0,0x4980,0x8941,0x4B00,0x8BC1,0x8A81,0x4A40,
00057         0x4E00,0x8EC1,0x8F81,0x4F40,0x8D01,0x4DC0,0x4C80,0x8C41,
00058         0x4400,0x84C1,0x8581,0x4540,0x8701,0x47C0,0x4680,0x8641,
00059         0x8201,0x42C0,0x4380,0x8341,0x4100,0x81C1,0x8081,0x4040
00060     };
00061     register USHORT CRC = 0;
00062 
00063     while(size--)
00064         CRC = (USHORT) (CRCTab[((CRC ^ *mem++) & 255)] ^ ((CRC >> 8) & 255));
00065 
00066     return CRC;
00067 }
